name: resT (itch) (qued)
description:
resT, a dream-like adventure game made for Godot Wild Jam 55

trip through 8 surreal worlds; find 15 hidden items; wake up

models by Quaternius

materials from ambientCG.com (CC0)

music by Kevin MacLeod

sounds from Pixabay, ScreamStudio, JuliusH, Josh74000MC, kindland, spacydreamy
